body.p: SCHOOL NEWS F. F. A. News Basketball again takes the spotlight in the F. F. A organizatlon. Thursday right the Ag. boys will meet the Eland gradi tournament chimp ins. who will be reinforced by some of the is freshmen and sophomore player it should be an evenly matched game, although the local boys have a slight, age advantage. Our locals didn't make too good a showing against Antigo, but they hop to play a much better brand of ball this next game. If they are successful in turning back these highly publicized grade champions, plus high schoo| help, they will have a very good chance of winning their return game with Antigio. Byron Johnson, F. F. A. Reporter.
